text.more: This interactive network is a work in progress, and revisions will occur throughout its' development.
text.intro:
Robert Z. Selden, Jr.

--

Citation data for indexed publications in Caddo archaeology were harvested from Scopus. This interactive graph includes 19.05% of all nodes (n=144) and 34.62% of all edges (n=324) used in the analysis. Nodes are sized by InDegree, meaning that those works with a greater number of incoming citations appear larger. Nodes are colored by modularity class, and edges by their source.

-----
